name: Cyber Snipa CSLMSW01 Wired Laser Mouse
Features: [The specially designed on-board-memory means you only have to program your S.W.A.T. mouse once, and your preferences will be remembered on any PC!, 6,400 frames per second, Tracking speed of 21 inches per second, 7 buttons, 3 of them macro programmable, Macro programming software, 32kb of onboard memory, 4 Teflon feet, On-the-fly dpi switching, Ergonomic non-slip curve design]
